name: CONCRETE VISIONS
description:
Concrete Visions


Concrete Visions is a first-person psychological thriller video game with survival horror, FPS and beat’em up elements. There are two main components to the gameplay - melee / lite arms combat and environmental exploration as you strive to survive the night.

Heavily influenced by games such as Condemned: Criminal Origins, Fahrenheit: Indigo Prophecy & Anatomy



The game's combat is built primarily around melee with firearms available.



The goal with Concrete Visions is to combine a disturbing photo sourced lo-fi atmosphere with nightmarish aesthetics in order to create a replayable gameplay experience for horror and retro FPS fans

STORY


The town of Stonebrook is desolate and all of the residents have disappeared.

All that remains are the junkies, the dregs, & the scum, and every one of them is out for blood.

Malone is a cult-like leader for these cretins, and you are certain he is responsible for the hordes of bastards on your tail.

Fight your way through these cold streets and wild overgrowth on a quest for answers, safety, and freedom.

It’s time to put fist to concrete.

FEATURES


Bloody Fists
Bottles
Lead Pipes
Kitchen Knives
A Revolver & A Shotgun

Crisps for Health OR Tasty Health Snacks!

Various Unhinged Enemies That See You As Their Prey

Brutally Visceral Melee Combat

A Chilling OST

Unnerving Photo-Sourced Environments & Character models

Secrets a plenty - See if you can locate DOSMan in each level – chances are he’ll have something very helpful for your journey.

CONTROLS:


Movement & Aim - WASD + Mouse

Interact/open doors - E

Flashlight - F
Switch Weapons - Scroll Wheel

Jump - Space

Crouch - Ctrl

Shoot Firearm / Melee Attack - LMB​

Punch - LMB for Left Fist & RMB for Right Fist

​Reload Firearm - R
